titles: An act and declaration of the Parliament of England touching a pamphlet, entituled, A declaration by the Kings Majesty, to his subjects of the kingdoms of Scotland, England and Ireland. Printed at Edinburgh, 1650.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by Edward Husband and John Field, Printers to the Parliament of England,
notes: Banning the work by Charles II.
Order to print signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Charles --  II, --  King of England, 1630-1685. --  Declaration by the Kings Majesty, to his subjects of the kingdoms of Scotland, England, and Ireland --  Early works to 1800.
